SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into rc_order_prod (ORDER_ID, PROD_ID, QUANTITY, AMOUNT, PROD_ORIGIN_PRICE, PROD_PRICE, PROD_SKU_ID, PROD_NAME, PRICE_MANNER, MEASURE_UNIT, MEASURE_UNIT_COUNT, STATUS) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prodId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quantity,jdbcType=REAL}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prodOriginPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prodPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prodSkuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceManner,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{measureUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{measureUnitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update rc_order_prod
ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PROD_ID = #{prodId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=REAL},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROD_ORIGIN_PRICE = #{prodOriginPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROD_PRICE = #{prodPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROD_SKU_ID = #{prodSkuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_NAME = #{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE_MANNER = #{priceManner,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MEASURE_UNIT = #{measureUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEASURE_UNIT_COUNT = #{measureUnitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ORDER_PROD_ID = #{orderProdId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ORDER_PROD_ID, ORDER_ID, PROD_ID, QUANTITY, AMOUNT, PROD_ORIGIN_PRICE, PROD_PRICE, PROD_SKU_ID, PROD_NAME, PRICE_MANNER, MEASURE_UNIT, MEASURE_UNIT_COUNT, STATUS from rc_order_prod where ORDER_PROD_ID = #{orderProdId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
